author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Altius Minerals Corp Q1 Earnings Per Share C$0.06
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Altius Minerals Corp:
* ALTIUS REPORTS Q1 2018 REVENUE OF $15.8M AND ADJUSTED EBITDA OF $12.7M
* Q1 REVENUE C$15.8 MILLION * ROYALTY REVENUE GUIDANCE FOR YEAR REMAINS UNCHANGED FROM $64 - $69 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
